fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose 3 players at day, you will put the first 2 in a battle and battle the third one yourself.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The battles will happen at night, this will roleblock all battlers.
> If you win, You can do 1 extra action each phase permanently.
> If you lose, You get hit by a Powerful attack.
> If you draw or the match gets to round 300, end the game and play another match.
- The winner will have to save a replay and the host will post it on their opponent's death message, if they dont, they die.
- The mode is Random battles and generation is chosen at random.
- You gain 1 point for winning a duel, you also gain 1 point by having the first target of your ability win the duel.
- https://pokemonshowdown.com
